title: Term contract for the procurement of 03 shipments (2,100,000 Bbls+/-5%)of Murban Crude Oil during the period from 2024-11-15 to 2025-04-14
decision_details: - Bids have been invited from the registered suppliers of the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation for the procurement of 03 shipments of Murban‑type Crude Oil (2,100,000 Bbls+/-5%) under the Payment prior to the date of quantity drawn (100% Ex.Storage Modality) during the period from 2024-11-15 to 2025-04-14. Only M/s. Vitol Asia Pte. Ltd., Singapore has submitted bids for this tender. Special Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee has recommended to award the Contract to that Company based on the recommendations of the Technical Evaluation Committee. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Power and Energy to award the relevant Contract, was approved by the Cabinet.
